Package com.example.LibraryManagement.database

Class BookRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.LibraryManagement.database.BookRepository
@Repository public class BookRepository extends Object
BookRepository class is responsible for managing book data in the SQLite database. It provides methods for adding, deleting, updating and finding books.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static BookRepository getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of BookRepository. Initializes the instance if it hasn't been created yet.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of BookRepository

    • addBook

      public boolean addBook(Book book)
      Adds a book to the database.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be added
      Returns:
      true if the addition is successful, false otherwise

    • deleteBookByID

      public boolean deleteBookByID(int id)
      Deletes a book from the database based on its ID. Ensures that foreign key constraints are enforced during the operation.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique id of the book to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • updateBookById

      public boolean updateBookById(int id, Book newBook)
      Updates a book in the database based on its ID. If the new book object is null, or if it is equal to the old book object, this method returns false. Otherwise, it updates the book with the new values. If the title or author of the new book is null, the old values are used instead.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique id of the book to be updated
      newBook - the new book object with the desired values
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • updateBookAvailability

      public boolean updateBookAvailability(int id, boolean availability)
      Updates the availability of a book in the database. If the book is not found in the database, this method returns false. Otherwise, it updates the availability of the book with the given id and returns true.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique id of the book to be updated
      availability - the new value for the availability of the book
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • getAllBooks

      public ArrayList<Book> getAllBooks()
      Retrieves all books from the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all books in the database

    • findBooksByTitle

      public ArrayList<Book> findBooksByTitle(String title)
      Retrieves a list of books from the database that match the given title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the books to search for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Book objects that have the specified title

    • findBooksByAuthor

      public ArrayList<Book> findBooksByAuthor(String author)
      Retrieves a list of books from the database that match the given author.
      Parameters:
      author - the author of the books to search for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Book objects that have the specified author

    • findBookById

      public Optional<Book> findBookById(int id)
      Finds a book by its unique id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book to be found
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found book, or an empty Optional if no such book exists

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(int id)
      Checks if a book is available. A book is available if it exists and its availability is true.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the book is available, false otherwise
